LESSON.HEADINGS: <1>Now let's practice these initial keys.</1> <2>Very good! And some more…</2> <3>Now let's add the G and H keys.</3> <4>Now let's practice all you've learned!</4> <5>Good job! Keep going…</5> <6>Excellent! Just a few more to finish this lesson.</6> <7>Almost done! Keep at it!</7> <8>And one more!</8>
LESSON.DESCRIPTION: In the second lesson you'll add the G and H keys and practice the basic key positions further. Keep your left hand on "ASDF" and your right hand on "JKL;".
